text: As Ranking Member of the Senate Finance Committee I am working with my colleagues on bipartisan policies to strengthen telehealth and expand access to these services.

Whether for rural communities urban areas or tribes telehealth has undoubtedly expanded access in underserved areas improved care coordination and integration and provided more privacy to patients to combat stigma.  http
